field.label: Enable Service
field.help: Enable Hetzner Cloud Dynamic DNS Service

field.label: Verbose Logging
field.help: Write detailed log entries to syslog

field.label: Force Update Interval (days)
field.help: Force DNS update even if IP unchanged after this many days. 0 = disabled (default: 0)

field.label: History Retention (days)
field.help: Number of days to keep DNS change history for undo functionality (1-365, default: 7)

field.label: Enable Propagation Check
field.help: After updating DNS, verify the record propagated to Hetzner's authoritative nameservers

field.label: Propagation Retries
field.help: Number of attempts to verify DNS propagation (1-10, default: 3)

field.label: Propagation Delay (seconds)
field.help: Seconds between propagation check retries (1-30, default: 2)
